sentence: Mike Brown; Kent County businesswoman Donna Brandenburg; Oakland County pastor Ralph Rebandt; Ottawa County real estate agent Ryan Kelley; Livingston County evangelist and substitute teacher Bob Scott; Lansing businessman Evan Space; and Grand Rapids entrepreneur and U.S. Army veteran Austin Chenge.
author: Paul Egan
title: 'Quality guru' Perry Johnson joins crowded Republican race for Michigan governor

sentence: Michael Brown of Stevensville, Byron Center businesswoman Donna Brandenburg, Farmington Hills Pastor Ralph Rebandt, and Grand Haven financial adviser Michael Markey would not be onstage with their competitors.
author: Paul Egan
title: GOP candidate for governor balks at Detroit Chamber debate over COVID-19 requirements
